headline: ServiceNow (NOW) Stock in Focus as Oppenheimer Reaffirms $1,150 Target
summary: ServiceNow, Inc. (NYSE:NOW) is one of the Trending AI Stocks on Wall Street. On October 9, Oppenheimer analyst Brian Schwartz reiterated an Outperform rating on the stock with a $1,150.00 price target. Conversations with a large ServiceNow partner have shed light on current business conditions and trends affecting the company’s fundamentals through year-end and into 2026, […]
